info.title: App Management APIs
info.description: Create and manage apps on-the-fly using our app management APIs

post.description: Creates an app in the account. It returns all the app related information.

skipSampleData.description: skips sample data if it is set true

appRegion.description: The USA region has serverslocated at Ohio.

post.description: Enables or disables the extension for an app.

enabled.description: Array of extension IDs that has to be enabled.

disabled.description: Array of extension IDs that has to be disabled.

extention_id2.message: The extension extension_id2 has been enabled successfully.

extention_id3.message: The extension extension_id1 has been enabled successfully.

data.description: The hook triggers after the auth token is created.
The hook triggers after the auth token is deleted.
The hook triggers after the auth token is updated.
The hook triggers after group is created.
The hook triggers after group is deleted.
The hook triggers after user joins a group.
The hook triggers after user leaves a group.
The hook triggers after members are added to group.
The hook triggers after members are banned from group.
The hook triggers after member is kicked from group.
The hook triggers after members are unbanned from group.
The hook triggers after user logs out.
The hook triggers after sending a message.
The hook will be triggered after changing the scope.
The hook triggers after user is deleted.
